work.name: Indian Institute of Technology, Hyderabad
work.summary: Causal Discovery, Time-series forecasting and Bayesian Learning

work.name: GeekyAnts India Pvt. Ltd.
work.summary: Responsible for project architecture and management, DevOps on certain projects (Azure, AWS, DigitalOcean), training and mentoring team members and managing open-source projects

work.name: GeekyAnts India Pvt. Ltd.
work.summary: Responsible for the design and development of full stack web and mobile applications and maintaining the open-source Vue Native project

work.name: GeekyAnts India Pvt. Ltd.
work.summary: Developed full stack web and mobile applications with React, Angular, Node.js and React Native based stacks

projects.name: Bayesian Causal Discovery
projects.summary: Bayesian models to learn the causal structure underlying data-generating processes, possibly in the presence of confounders. This work is a part of my MTech Thesis.

projects.name: Causal Discovery on Multivariate Time Series Data with Missing Values
projects.summary: A Bayesian model to learn the causal structure underlying a time series data-generating process in the presence of missing values.

projects.name: Causal Fairness Analysis
projects.summary: A study and comparison of Causality-based metrics with existing state-of-the-art explainability methods such as Lime and SHAP to analyse the fairness of machine learning models. This work was done as part of the course 'Explainability in Machine Learning' conducted by Dr. Konda Reddy Mopuri (2023).

projects.name: Real-time Scheduler for Multiprocessor Systems based on Simulated Annealing
projects.summary: Developed a scheduling algorithm for real-time tasks in multiprocessor environments using Simulated Annealing as the optimization algorithm. This was part of my final year BE degree project.

projects.name: Command and Control platform for IoT devices
projects.summary: A platform to collect telemetry from and pass command messages to IoT devices built on Node.js, Express, TypeScript, Eclipse Hono, Postgres, Kubernetes and Next.js.

projects.name: Vue Native
projects.summary: I was the maintainer of Vue Native, a framework to build cross-platform native mobile apps using Vue.js. Built on top of React Native with compatibility for most React Native UI libraries.
